name: torrentially
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If it rains torrentially, it rains very heavily: Around lunchtime it began to rain torrentially. The rain continued to fall torrentially until the evening.
If water moves torrentially, it moves in large amounts very quickly: During the rainy season, the river flows torrentially through the valley. The flood waters swept torrentially down from the hills.
